[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="100px||100px||true|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||64px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="JetBrains Mono|500|||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="11px" text_letter_spacing="3px" text_orientation="center" header_2_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#253B50" header_2_font_size="44px" header_2_line_height="1.15em" global_colors_info="{}"]

Industry Expertise

Built for Your Industry

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.6em" text_orientation="center" max_width="600px" module_alignment="center" global_colors_info="{}"]

We don’t just understand manufacturing—we understand YOUR manufacturing.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_tabs _builder_version="4.27.0" tab_font="Lexend|500|||||||" tab_text_color="#64748b" tab_font_size="14px" body_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" body_text_color="#64748b" body_font_size="17px" body_line_height="1.75em" active_tab_text_color="#253B50" background_color="#ffffff" border_radii="on|24px|24px|24px|24px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="48px" box_shadow_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.08)" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_tab title="Automotive Parts" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"]

Automotive Parts Manufacturing

Thailand is ASEAN’s automotive hub. We understand what tier-1 OEMs demand: perfect traceability, JIT delivery, and EDI integration that works—every time.

  • Toyota/Honda/Denso EDI integration
  • IATF 16949 compliance support
  • Lot-level traceability for recalls
  • Kanban and JIT scheduling

Explore Automotive Solutions

[/et_pb_tab] [et_pb_tab title="Electronics Assembly" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"]

Electronics Assembly

High-mix, low-volume. Fast product cycles. Thousands of components per board. We built our MES for exactly this complexity.

  • SMT machine integration
  • Component-level traceability
  • MSD (moisture sensitivity) management
  • AOI integration and defect tracking

Explore Electronics Solutions

[/et_pb_tab] [et_pb_tab title="Metal & Plastics" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"]

Metal & Plastics Processing

Stamping, injection molding, CNC machining. Process manufacturing where yield optimization and scrap reduction drive your margins.

  • Process parameter monitoring
  • Mold/die lifecycle management
  • Scrap analysis and reduction
  • Cycle time optimization

Explore Metal & Plastics Solutions

[/et_pb_tab] [/et_pb_tabs] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

info.name: DigiWin Homepage - Section 6: Industry Tabs
info.description: Tabbed industry selector with 3 tabs: Automotive Parts, Electronics Assembly, Metal & Plastics. Each tab shows industry title, description, 4 features, and CTA button. Uses native DIVI Tabs module.
divi_modules_used: et_pb_tab (individual tab content with inline HTML)
notes: SVG illustrations from HTML version are NOT included in tabs
Tab content uses inline HTML for heading/list/CTA styling
The HTML version used a 2-column layout (image + text) per tab - DIVI Tabs are single-column, so content is text-only
Consider using Toggle or separate rows with show/hide if 2-column tab content is needed later
